QuestData.Title: Something that Burns
QuestData.Description: Alright, we need something that's going to make the compound go, "Boom"!$B$BI'm all out of gun powder, but I think I know what we can use instead... the heart of my fire elemental!$B$BHere, take my fire totem east to the Blood Trail. Just flip the switch on it near any of the lava pools over there and Magmatooth should be summoned. Bring back his heart and we'll be in business.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Goldmine said it was okay to get his Burning Heart, so I guess it's okay....
QuestData.RewardText: Uh oh. Sounds like he wasn't very happy about the situation. How was I to know? I'm just an initiate after all.$B$BAnyway, I'll worry about Magmatooth later.
